sentences.en: " Obliteration is not a justifiable act of war "
sentences.cn: “ 彻底消灭并不是有理的战争行为 ”

sentences.en: A person who causes harm in exercising justifiable defense shall not bear vivil liability.
sentences.cn: 因正当防卫造成损害的,不承担民事责任.

sentences.en: Any more restrictive measures must be consistent and justifiable scientifically.
sentences.cn: 更多的限制标准必须具科学一贯性与合理性.
这些实验合乎道德准则吗？

sentences.en: Articles devoid of substance are the least justifiable and the most objectionable.
sentences.cn: 最不应该、最要反对的是言之无物的文章.

sentences.en: Deviation is justifiable to save life or property.
sentences.cn: 如果是因人命和财产的救助,绕航是合理的行为.

sentences.en: I am ready to run risks if they are reasonably justifiable.
sentences.cn: 如果有着冒险的充分理由,我是甘愿冒险的.

sentences.en: It is justifiable to utilize the concepts of either wave or particles.
sentences.cn: 无论运用波动概念还是运用微粒概念都是合理可取的.

sentences.en: It is not justifiable save for very special purposes.
sentences.cn: 除用于非常特殊的目的以外,它不能算是正当的.

sentences.en: Justifiable defense is the act being exempted from crimes.
sentences.cn: 正当防卫不属于犯罪行为.

sentences.en: That is not a justifiable act of war.
sentences.cn: 这是不能够辩解的战争行为.

sentences.en: The cutbacks are justifiable on the grounds of cost.
sentences.cn: 削减符合成本方面的考虑.

sentences.en: The jury returned a verdict of justifiable homicide.
sentences.cn: 陪审团作出了正当杀人的裁决.

sentences.en: The rule is justifiable on safety grounds.
sentences.cn: 出于安全方面的考虑,这一规定是合理的.

sentences.en: What he has done is hardly justifiable.
sentences.cn: 他的所作所为说不过去。

sentences.en: When, if ever, is it morally justifiable to allow a patient to die?
sentences.cn: 如果可能的话，允许病人放弃生命的行为什么时候在道德上可以被接受？
